content: bealers: Focused on expanding the plugin ecosystem this month, making a significant contribution by adding the Mattermost plugin to the registry (elizaos-plugins/registry#188) with a substantial change of +2371/-6560 lines. They also showed forward-thinking by drafting a proposal for Docker infrastructure enhancements (elizaos/eliza#5583). In addition to their own code, they were active in discussions, leaving 5 PR comments and 2 issue comments. Their work was concentrated on documentation and configuration files, reflecting their focus on plugins and infrastructure.
